Key Match Events: Chinese effort cleared off the line
Wu Lei and Zhang Yuning denied three times in quick succession by goalkeeper Mostafa Matar
Hassan Maatoukt struck China's bar in first-half injury time
Hasan Srour also clipped the top of the goal-frame
China came within inches of taking the lead when Matar made a mess of a tame effort, but Lebanon cleared off the line
Post-Match Reflections: This was another blow for Chinese football, which is reeling from a graft scandal at home
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lebanon and China are yet to score in the 2023 Asian Cup
Hosts and holders Qatar play debutants Tajikistan in the group later in the day with the last 16 within reach
Qatar top Group A with three points and a game in hand, with China on two, and Tajikistan and Lebanon on one
Playing in mint green and fresh from a 0-0 draw with Tajikistan, China were on the back foot early against a team ranked 28 places below them
Lebanon were beaten 3-0 by Qatar in the opening game of the tournament but their height and strength caused a sluggish China problems
